title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: in pencil on back: Pearl Epstein
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Brick repeat of woman walking along fence with large trees, buildings, and "danger" sign. Printed in blue, yellow, red, (blue over yellow for green, blue over red for purple, bleu over yellow and red for brown, red over yellow for orange) on white ground.
